name: Akvo-docs
tagline: The core repository for documentation we will store at http://docs.akvo.org (or equivalent)
body:
# Docs.akvo.org
A library of links to particular Akvo documentation.

## Internal IT

### Userguides: [Dropbox](https://www.dropbox.com/sh/uma8bfk0wd3rrsh/AAApV55D0tXYZfAVp9uN4PMQa?dl=0) | [Email client setup](https://www.dropbox.com/sh/tgj0ls3i317whke/AACYyie6mhyGzSsmNf-oOqpva?dl=0) |  [Piwik web analytics](http://piwik.org/docs/#statistics-analysis) | 

## Legal information

### Policies:  [Cookies](http://akvo.org/help/akvo-policies-and-terms-2/akvo-terms-of-use/cookie-policy/) | [Anti-corruption & sanctions](http://akvo.org/help/akvo-policies-and-terms-2/anti-corruption-and-sanction-policy/) | [Non-discrimination](http://akvo.org/help/akvo-policies-and-terms-2/akvo-non-discrimination-policy/) | [Privacy](http://akvo.org/help/akvo-policies-and-terms-2/akvo-privacy-policy/) | [Licensing & copyrighting](http://akvo.org/help/akvo-policies-and-terms-2/akvo-licensing-and-copyrights/) | [Akvopedia](http://akvopedia.org/wiki/Akvopedia:Policies_and_guidelines) | [Akvopedia privacy](http://akvopedia.org/wiki/Akvopedia:Privacy_policy) | [User contribution](http://akvo.org/user-contribution-policy/) | 

### Terms & conditions:  [Akvo.org terms of use](http://akvo.org/help/akvo-policies-and-terms-2/akvo-terms-of-use/) | [Donations](http://akvo.org/help/akvo-donation-policy/) | [General terms & conditions](http://akvo.org/help/akvo-policies-and-terms-2/akvo-general-terms-and-conditions/) | [Akvo FLOW](http://akvo.org/help/akvo-policies-and-terms-2/akvo-general-terms-and-conditions/exhibit-a-akvo-flow-services-and-support-terms-and-conditions/) | [Akvo RSR](http://akvo.org/help/akvo-policies-and-terms-2/akvo-general-terms-and-conditions/exhibit-b-akvo-rsr-services-and-support-terms-and-conditions/) | [Akvopedia](http://akvo.org/help/akvo-policies-and-terms-2/akvo-general-terms-and-conditions/exhibit-c-akvopedia-services-and-support-terms-and-conditions/) | [API code of conduct](http://akvo.org/help/api-code-of-conduct/) | 

## Products

###  Akvo RSR:  [Source code](https://github.com/akvo/akvo-rsr) | 



#### Akvo RSRUp

###  Akvo FLOW:  [Source code](https://github.com/akvo/akvo-flow) | [Manual](https://flow.readthedocs.org/en/latest/index.html) | [Tutorials](https://flow.readthedocs.org/en/latest/docs/tutorials.html) | [Monitoring feature](https://github.com/akvo/akvo-product-design/blob/master/FLOW/Features/1-MonitoringFeatures/FunctionalDesign/MonitoringFeatures.md) | [Smartphone field guide](http://flowhelp.akvo.org/kb/flow-support-documentation/smartphone-field-guide) | [Dashboard](http://flow.readthedocs.org/en/latest/docs/topic/dashboard.html) | [Quick start guide - Enumerators EN](https://www.dropbox.com/s/4ha28qwn79aw08z/Quick%20start%20guide%20-%20Enumerators-Aug2013.pdf?dl=0)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
